nodes.text: The Ringo Vinda system was a star system located in the Eucer sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim that contained the planet Ringo Vinda, which was orbited by a space station. During the Clone Wars, the Battle of Ringo Vinda was fought in this system between the Galactic Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems in the year 20 BBY.

The Ringo Vinda system first appeared in "The Unknown," the first episode of the animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' sixth season, which originally aired in Germany on February 15, 2014. It was first identified in The Essential Atlas Online Companion, which placed the system in grid square R-7.
